items.value: Play Hide-and-Seek with Baldi! Can you beat all the levels without losing?
<color=green>Continue your game of Hide-and-Seek with Baldi!</color>
Explore Baldi's Super Schoolhouse to your heart's content! You can explore any level you've reached in Hide-and-Seek.
Try your hand at one of Baldi's crazy challenges!
Collect as many notebooks as you can before Baldi tags you! Baldi speeds up over time, but notebooks slow him down!
Play endless versions of your favorite field trips and try to set the highest scores!

Baldi's Basics Plus is currently in early access! There's still a lot of work to be done to the game, including:
Improved menus, dynamic music, horror elements, edutainment elements, and more content (Like levels, challenges, characters, etc).
<color=red> Expect bugs! If you encounter a bug, please report it with the link below.

Are you ready to leave?
<color=red>The items left on the counter will be lost!</color>
Play in a randomly generated level! You can enter a custom seed or have one randomly selected. You can also click on a high score to get the seed it used!

You've snuck in school after hours! Surely Principal of the Things will be after you. Use <color=red>dirty chalk erasers</color>, <color=red>lockers</color>, and your <color=red>map</color> to avoid being seen and collect 7 notebooks.
It's just you and Baldi in this challenge. The catch is, both of you move super fast! Can you think fast enough to collect 25 notebooks and escape the school?
You're legs might be broken, but thankfully you're equipped with an infinite use <color=red>grappling hook</color>! See if you can outwit Baldi and his friends when this is your only way to move!
Help Baldi put the correct amount of sticks in each fire! You'll need to be a quick thinker if you want the highest score!
Help the farmer bring his animals back into the barn! Lead them through a corn maze as quickly as you can! The faster you are, the more points you'll earn!
The farm field trip will return shortly! Baldi apologizes for the delay.
Now THAT'S a new high score!!!
Leave blank for a random seed
What the?! This shouldn't be possible!

Energy Flavored Zesty Bar
Eat one of these and get a boost of energy! Fills up your stamina more than you can just by taking a rest!

BSODA
Open a can of fizzed up BSODA and spray away anyone who's trying to get in your way! Ingredients: Blue, high fructose corn syrup, electricity, and 2% or less of: Water, blue 2.

Big Ol' Boots
These big ol' boots will help you keep your feet on the ground! Prevents you from getting pushed by characters and obstacles found around the school.

Principal's Keys
Break all the rules you want with the Principal's Keys! Use them to open any locked door, even ones that haven't been locked by Principal of the Thing!

Grappling Hook
Fire this baby at a far away wall to quickly get pulled towards it. Can get you out of sticky situations quick.

WD-NoSquee
Tired of noises giving your location away? WD-NoSquee can solve your problems! Spray it on a door or locker to make it silent. Baldi can't hear silence!

Quarter
A shiny quarter! Useful for anything that requires a shiny quarter!

Swinging Door Lock
Place this on any swinging door to lock it for a few seconds, preventing anyone from coming through. Keep in mind that people can still see through locked swinging doors!

Baldi's Least Favorite Tape
This tape was carefully designed by a student to effectively make Baldi deaf as long as it plays. If you can hear the tone, you can make all the noise you want, worry free!

An Apple for Baldi
Give this to Baldi and he won't be able to resist taking a quick break to scarf it down!

Alarm Clock
Set this clock up and when it goes off, Baldi will want to check it out! Unless he sees you of course, he's not *that* stupid.

Dirty Chalk Eraser
Create a cloud of chalk dust and block off the sight of Baldi and his freinds. Stand inside to hide, or use it to sneak past characters without them seeing you.

Faculty Nametag
Experience what's it's like to work in Baldi's Super Schoolhouse! When you have this on, no one will bother you! Well, except for Baldi, he knows a fake nametag when he sees one.

Principal Whistle
Need instant justice? Blow this whistle and Principal of the Thing will come to your aid as quickly as he can!

Safety Scissors
Slice through anything* with these high-end safety Scissors!
*Actually, these are the dullest scissors ever made and can only cut through jumpropes, bubble gum, and cheap wires.

Dangerous Teleporter
Use this and there's no telling where you'll end up! It could take you to safety or certain doom! Now that's what I call fun!

Portal Poster
If there's a room on the other side, place this on the wall to get through. A super technology invented by Baldi himself!

Welcome to Johnny's Store!
Just click on any items you want to buy. Once you've picked your favorite items, click and drag them into your inventory. It's that easy! Any items left on the counter when you leave will be lost.

Fill your map!
Buy this and your map will be completed instantly! With this you could plan a route before even stepping foot in a level, and maybe even discover some secrets!

This isn't available yet!
I wonder what it could be for...
Baldi's fog machine malfunctioned again! Ack! Hack!
Looks like the leak is leaking again. Watch out for the whirlpools!
Uh oh, sounds like Baldi is going to need a new ruler...
Test procedure imminent! We use these doors when students try to escape!
Party at the Principal's office! Come and get your present!
A mystery room has appeared! Find it before it disappears!
Woah! Gravity is going crazy?! What has Baldi done now?
You lost?! Try better next time!
You done it! The fires are really warm! You've earned these prizes!
Thanks to you, all the work is done sooner (Rather than later)! The hot dogs smell great!
Oh, hi! Let's play hide and seek!

All right, all set! I'll go set up the bear traps! I want you to keep the fire going. Go out into the woods to collect firewood, then bring it back to refuel the fiiire. The bigger the fire is, the more points you'll earn! Alright, go for it!
Ready or not, here I come!
Thanks for playing, come back soon!
I can't believe it! You're incredible!

items.key: Comment Cloudy Copter VFX start here

items.value: No being in school after-hours in the halls!
No drinking drinks in the halls!
No eating food in the halls!
No escaping detention in the halls!
No entering faculty only rooms in the halls!
No looking in other people's lockers in the halls!
No stabbing people with unused dialogue in the halls!
Your parents will hear about this one!
Say, who's lookin' to see a neat trick?
One, two, buckle my shoe. Three, four, I've got gum for you!
Does anyone wanna see somethin' cool?
I skip all day, I say-I say, I skip to push the pain away!
Hooka, a-chew, I'mma chewin' mah gum. Booka, a-too, it's tons o' fum... Er, fun!
Psst! Don't let the grownups spot this.
Watch the pro go to work!
Feast your eyes while I feast on mah gum!
Huh, so maybe that's why they held me back.
Hippity hey, look at the time; I need to fetch some more rhyme.
Skip away, skip away, it'll go away.
I'll be sent to the guy of the Thing, smacking my head 'n' causing a ring!
Time to bounce, time to flee, before they throw the book at me!
They're gonna be so mad at me, I'm so sorry!
Wow! That's great! Let's play again... Sometime soon!
I'll take that! It's mine now...

items.value: I AM COMING READY OR NOR HERE I COME
I HAVE BEEN PROGRAMMED TO DESIRE YOUR IMAGE
I HAVE LOST YOU - I DON'T LIKE THAT
I HUG PEOPLE FOR ALL ETERNITY

items.value: Check your map to see where my class is.
Just reminding you to be at my class in
WHYYYYYYY WEREN'T YOU AT MY CLAAAAAAASSS?!?!?!
